entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 08:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -38.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
